title: Air travel and infectious disease spread correlate

content.question: Of the phenomena that correlate with the data above, the one that is the most direct consequence of the trend in air travel is

choices.label: the increase in the spread of infectious diseases
the increase in hypoxic aquatic ecosystems
the decrease in the total fertility rate of developed nations

content.answer: the increase in the spread of infectious diseases

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
